title: 新约 - 约翰福音(John) - 第 9 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 约翰福音(John) -- 第 9 章 ( 本篇共有 21 章 )

lineList.en: And as Jesus passed by, he saw a man which was blind from his birth.
lineList.cn: 耶稣过去的时候，看见一个人生来是瞎眼的。

lineList.en: And his disciples asked him, saying, Master, who did sin, this man, or his parents, that he was born blind?
lineList.cn: 门徒问耶稣说，拉比，这人生来是瞎眼的，是谁犯了罪，是这人呢，是他父母呢。

lineList.en: Jesus answered, Neither hath this man sinned, nor his parents: but that the works of God should be made manifest in him.
lineList.cn: 耶稣回答说，也不是这人犯了罪，也不是他父母犯了罪，是要在他身上显出神的作为来。

lineList.en: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.
lineList.cn: 趁着白日，我们必须作那差我来者的工。黑夜将到，就没有人能作工了。

lineList.en: As long as I am in the world, I am the light of the world.
lineList.cn: 我在世上的时候，是世上的光。

lineList.en: When he had thus spoken, he spat on the ground, and made clay of the spittle, and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay,
lineList.cn: 耶稣说了这话，就吐唾沫在地上，用唾沫和泥抹在瞎子的眼睛上，

lineList.en: And said unto him, Go, wash in the pool of Siloam, (which is by interpretation, Sent.) He went his way therefore, and washed, and came seeing.
lineList.cn: 对他说，你往西罗亚池子里去洗，（西罗亚翻出来，就是奉差遣）他去一洗，回头就看见了。

lineList.en: The neighbours therefore, and they which before had seen him that he was blind, said, Is not this he that sat and begged?
lineList.cn: 他的邻舍，和那素常见他是讨饭的，就说，这不是那从前坐着讨饭的人吗。

lineList.en: Some said, This is he: others said, He is like him: but he said, I am he.
lineList.cn: 有人说，是他。又有人说，不是，却是像他。他自己说，是我。

lineList.en: Therefore said they unto him, How were thine eyes opened?
lineList.cn: 他们对他说，你的眼睛是怎吗开的呢。

lineList.en: He answered and said, A man that is called Jesus made clay, and anointed mine eyes, and said unto me, Go to the pool of Siloam, and wash: and I went and washed, and I received sight.
lineList.cn: 他回答说，有一个人名叫耶稣。他和泥抹我的眼睛，对我说，你往西罗亚池子去洗。我去一洗，就看见了。

lineList.en: Then said they unto him, Where is he? He said, I know not.
lineList.cn: 他们说，那个人在那里。他说，我不知道。

lineList.en: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind.
lineList.cn: 他们把从前瞎眼的人，带到法利赛人那里。

lineList.en: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay, and opened his eyes.
lineList.cn: 耶稣和泥开他眼睛的日子是安息日。

lineList.en: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight. He said unto them, He put clay upon mine eyes, and I washed, and do see.
lineList.cn: 法利赛人也问他是怎吗得看见的。瞎子对他们说，他把泥抹在我的眼睛上，我去一洗，就看见了。

lineList.en: Therefore said some of the Pharisees, This man is not of God, because he keepeth not the sabbath day. Others said, How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles? And there was a division among them.
lineList.cn: 法利赛人中有的说，这个人不是从神来的，因为他不守安息日。又有人说，一个罪人怎能行这样的神迹呢。他们就起了分争。

lineList.en: They say unto the blind man again, What sayest thou of him, that he hath opened thine eyes? He said, He is a prophet.
lineList.cn: 他们又对瞎子说，他既然开了你的眼睛，你说他是怎样的人呢。他说，是个先知。

lineList.en: But the Jews did not believe concerning him, that he had been blind, and received his sight, until they called the parents of him that had received his sight.
lineList.cn: 犹太人不信他从前是瞎眼，后来能看见的，等到叫了他的父母来，

lineList.en: And they asked them, saying, Is this your son, who ye say was born blind? how then doth he now see?
lineList.cn: 问他们说，这是你们的儿子吗。你们说他生来是瞎眼的，如今怎吗能看见了呢。

lineList.en: His parents answered them and said, We know that this is our son, and that he was born blind:
lineList.cn: 他父母回答说，他是我们的儿子，生来就瞎眼，这是我们知道的。

lineList.en: But by what means he now seeth, we know not; or who hath opened his eyes, we know not: he is of age; ask him: he shall speak for himself.
lineList.cn: 至于他如今怎吗能看见，我们却不知道。是谁开了他的眼睛，我们也不知道。他已经成了人，你们问他吧。他自己必能说。

lineList.en: These words spake his parents, because they feared the Jews: for the Jews had agreed already, that if any man did confess that he was Christ, he should be put out of the synagogue.
lineList.cn: 他父母说这话，是怕犹太人，因为犹太人已经商议定了，若有认耶稣是基督的，要把他赶出会堂。

lineList.en: Therefore said his parents, He is of age; ask him.
lineList.cn: 因此他父母说，他已经成了人，你们问他吧。

lineList.en: Then again called they the man that was blind, and said unto him, Give God the praise: we know that this man is a sinner.
lineList.cn: 所以法利赛人第二次叫了那从前瞎眼的人来，对他说，你该将荣耀归给神。我们知道这人是个罪人。

lineList.en: He answered and said, Whether he be a sinner or no, I know not: one thing I know, that, whereas I was blind, now I see.
lineList.cn: 他说，他是个罪人不是，我不知道。有一件事我知道，从前我是眼瞎的，如今能看见了。

lineList.en: Then said they to him again, What did he to thee? how opened he thine eyes?
lineList.cn: 他们就问他说，他向你作什么，是怎吗开了你的眼睛呢。

lineList.en: He answered them, I have told you already, and ye did not hear: wherefore would ye hear it again? will ye also be his disciples?
lineList.cn: 他回答说，我方才告诉你们，你们不听。为什么又要听呢。莫非你们也要作他的门徒吗。

lineList.en: Then they reviled him, and said, Thou art his disciple; but we are Moses' disciples.
lineList.cn: 他们就骂他说，你是他的门徒。我们是摩西的门徒。

lineList.en: We know that God spake unto Moses: as for this fellow, we know not from whence he is.
lineList.cn: 神对摩西说话，是我们知道的。只是这个人，我们不知道他从那里来。

lineList.en: The man answered and said unto them, Why herein is a marvellous thing, that ye know not from whence he is, and yet he hath opened mine eyes.
lineList.cn: 那人回答说，他开了我的眼睛，你们竟不知道他从那里来，这真是奇怪。

lineList.en: Now we know that God heareth not sinners: but if any man be a worshipper of God, and doeth his will, him he heareth.
lineList.cn: 我们知道神不听罪人。惟有敬奉神旨意的，神才听他。

lineList.en: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind.
lineList.cn: 从创世以来，未曾听见有人把生来是瞎子的眼睛开了。

lineList.en: If this man were not of God, he could do nothing.
lineList.cn: 这人若不是从神来的，什么也不能作。

lineList.en: They answered and said unto him, Thou wast altogether born in sins, and dost thou teach us? And they cast him out.
lineList.cn: 他们回答说，你全然生在罪孽中，还要教训我们吗。于是把他赶出去了。

lineList.en: Jesus heard that they had cast him out; and when he had found him, he said unto him, Dost thou believe on the Son of God?
lineList.cn: 耶稣听说他们把他赶出去。后来遇见他，就说，你信神的儿子吗。

lineList.en: He answered and said, Who is he, Lord, that I might believe on him?
lineList.cn: 他回答说，主阿，谁是神的儿子，叫我信他呢。

lineList.en: And Jesus said unto him, Thou hast both seen him, and it is he that talketh with thee.
lineList.cn: 耶稣说，你已经看见他，现在和你说话的就是他。

lineList.en: And he said, Lord, I believe. And he worshipped him.
lineList.cn: 他说，主阿，我信。就拜耶稣。

lineList.en: And Jesus said, For judgment I am come into this world, that they which see not might see; and that they which see might be made blind.
lineList.cn: 耶稣说，我为审判到这世上来，叫不能看见的，可以看见。能看见的，反瞎了眼。

lineList.en: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words, and said unto him, Are we blind also?
lineList.cn: 同他在那里的法利赛人，听见这话，就说，难道我们也瞎了眼吗。

lineList.en: Jesus said unto them, If ye were blind, ye should have no sin: but now ye say, We see; therefore your sin remaineth.
lineList.cn: 耶稣对他们说，你们若瞎了眼，就没有罪了。但如今你们说，我们能看见，所以你们的罪还在。
